title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 67.1 - Minimum balance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 67.1 - Minimum balance

State Regulations

Savings banks and savings and loan associations may require
that a minimum balance in a day of deposit-day of withdrawal account be
maintained until the end of any dividend or interest period in which a
withdrawal from such account is made; provided, however, that any savings bank
or savings and loan association requiring a minimum deposit shall so indicate
clearly on all passbooks issued for such accounts. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
67.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
